import Login from './Login'; import React from 'react'; import style from './carousel.css'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; const Carousel = () => { const text = useSelector((state) => state.text.login); const dispatch = useDispatch(); console.log('appten',text) return (
{ text === true? : false }
) } export default Carousel
